hero.tagline: Direct from Dampit, East Java — Indonesia
hero.description: PT. Sukses Ekspor Mandiri provides premium Robusta green beans sourced directly from Dampit, Malang — one of Indonesia's most renowned Robusta origins. Competitive pricing with reliable quality.

about.desc1: As a direct sourcing company based in Indonesia, PT. Sukses Ekspor Mandiri provides Robusta green beans from farming communities in Dampit, Malang — one of East Java's most productive coffee regions. We are committed to delivering authentic Indonesian Robusta at competitive prices for your business.
about.desc2: Our team works closely with local producers, ensuring every batch of green beans meets the quality standards your market demands.

product.description: Dampit is one of Indonesia's premier Robusta-producing regions, known for its volcanic soil and ideal growing conditions in the highlands of East Java.
product.custom_grading_desc: We can accommodate specific screen size, moisture content, and defect count requirements based on your market needs. Contact us to discuss your specifications.

process.description: A streamlined process designed for efficiency and transparency.
process.step1_desc: Share your requirements — origin, grade, volume, and destination. We respond within 24 hours.
process.step2_desc: Receive a competitive quote with transparent pricing. Request samples to evaluate quality firsthand.
process.step3_desc: Confirm your order. We handle sourcing, quality control, grading, and documentation.
process.step4_desc: Your coffee ships from Indonesian ports with full tracking. FOB and CIF terms available.

trust.description: We build trust through transparent communication, consistent quality, and reliable service.
trust.item1_desc: Headquartered in Indonesia with direct access to major coffee-producing regions across the archipelago.
trust.item2_desc: Our team has strong knowledge in Indonesian coffee sourcing, quality assessment, and international logistics.
trust.item3_desc: Full traceability from farm to port. We provide detailed origin information and processing methods for every lot.
trust.item4_desc: All shipments include complete documentation: Certificate of Origin, Phytosanitary Certificate, and ICO certificates.

contact.description: Whether you're sourcing Indonesian coffee for the first time or looking for a reliable supply partner, we'd love to hear from you. Share your requirements and our team will prepare a tailored proposal.
contact.placeholder_message: Tell us about your coffee requirements — origin, grade, volume, etc.
contact.toast_desc: Thank you! Our team will respond within 24 hours.

footer.company: PT. Sukses Ekspor Mandiri — Direct Coffee Sourcing, Indonesia
footer.rights: © {{year}} PT. Sukses Ekspor Mandiri. All rights reserved.
